div.p: CIDM is an organization dedicated to helping advance the profession of information development worldwide. Through CIDM, information professionals can communicate with each other regularly and learn about each other’s successes, problems, and innovations.

ul.li:
Conference Passes and Discounts
To encourage participation in CIDM conferences, members receive free and discounted registrations. The number of free passes depends on your membership level and conference. Members always receive the best pricing available for all CIDM conferences.

Best Practices Newsletter
The Best Practices newsletter available to all CIDM members contains a wealth of industry-related information. The quarterly newsletter is emailed directly to the members then each newsletter article is posted on the CIDM website for future reference. Access to the articles is a benefit to members only.

Members-Only Forum
Members can join the member-only CIDM Slack Workspace to connect and collaborate. On the CIDM Slack Workspace, members can find channels for hiring, training, quality control, metrics, content reuse, change management, and more!

Management Round Tables
Members can participate in monthly “open-mic” sessions to discuss trends and issues associated with information-development. Each month we present a new topic selected by members. We’ve discussed everything from managing remote employees to working with Subject Matter Experts.

Information Development Advice
CIDM is managed by Comtech Services, a leading consulting firm that has been helping clients produce better technical content for over 40 years. Members can reach out to the Comtech consultants for advice or brainstorm innovated ideas.

Workshop Discounts
Members receive discounts for Comtech’s content strategy and DITA training classes. Gold and Platinum level members benefit from a two-for-one pricing option for most public workshops and also receive a 10% discount on customized in-house workshops.
